shortcut_howto: How-to: Right-click on Desktop -> New -> Shortcut -> Paste this command

Rename '{old_name}' to '{new_name}'.

error_rename_stopped: The distribution must be stopped to rename it.

error_rename_duplicate: The name '{new_name}' is already in use. Please choose another name.
